transcript: I don't care what you do see you could paint yourself green and dance naked in the plasphoon dome and rush off madly with all the men in the world And I shant say a word as long as you love me best

segments.text: I don't care what you do see you could paint yourself green and dance naked in the plasphoon dome and rush off madly with all the men in the world
And I shant say a word as long as you love me best

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't care what you do.  See, you could paint yourself green and dance naked in the Place Vendome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word.  As long as you love me best.
